meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regressive.
meanings.sent1: The regressivenesses of the policy led to a decline in progress.
meanings.sent2: The regressivenesses of the tax system disproportionately affected low-income families.
meanings.sent3: The regressivenesses of the old clock made it run slower and slower each day.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness had a regressivenesses that dragged the team down.
meanings.sent5: The regressivenesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: The tendency to move backward or revert to a previous state.
meanings.sent1: The regressivenesses of his behavior surprised everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The regressivenesses of the economy slowed down the country's development.
meanings.sent3: The regressivenesses of the remote control made it change channels randomly.
meanings.sent4: The regressivenesses of the decision took us back to square one.
meanings.sent5: The regressivenesses of the software update caused more problems than it solved.
